company_1_description: Orange Côte d'Ivoire is a leading telecommunications operator in Côte d'Ivoire, offering mobile, fixed, and internet services. As a key player in the digital economy, we are committed to innovation and providing our customers with an unparalleled experience.
company_2_tagline: The leader in agro-industry in West Africa
company_2_description: SIFCA is a leading agro-industrial group specializing in the cultivation, processing, and marketing of palm oil, natural rubber, and sugar cane. With a strong commitment to sustainable development, SIFCA plays a major role in the economies of West Africa.
company_3_description: Bridge Bank Group Côte d'Ivoire offers a wide range of banking and financial services to individuals, businesses, and institutions. Our mission is to support the economic development of the region by providing innovative and tailored financial solutions.
company_4_description: Bolloré Logistics is a global leader in international transport and logistics. We offer a full range of services, including multimodal transport, customs and regulatory compliance, logistics, and supply chain management, supported by a large integrated logistics network.
school_1_description: The Institut National Polytechnique Félix Houphouët-Boigny (INP-HB) is a public polytechnic institute in Yamoussoukro, Côte d'Ivoire. It is a leading institution for engineering, technology, and agricultural sciences in West Africa.
school_2_description: The Université Félix Houphouët-Boigny (formerly the University of Cocody) is the largest university in Côte d'Ivoire. It offers a comprehensive range of programs across multiple faculties, including medicine, law, economics, and humanities.
school_3_description: Groupe CSI Pôle Polytechnique is a well-regarded private higher education institution in Abidjan. It focuses on providing quality education in technology, industrial sciences, and management to meet the demands of the modern workforce.
school_desc_1: A leading polytechnic institution in West Africa, focused on engineering, technology, and applied sciences.
school_desc_2: The largest university in Côte d'Ivoire, offering a wide range of programs in science, arts, and humanities.
school_desc_3: A private higher education group known for its focus on technology, management, and innovation.

Find answers to common questions or get: Find answers to common questions or get in touch with our team.
Can't find an answer? Reach out to us.
faq_q_password: How do I reset my password?
faq_a_password: You can reset your password by going to the login page and clicking the 'Forgot your password?' link. If you are already logged in, you can change it from the Settings page.
faq_q_info: How do I update my account information?
faq_a_info: You can update your personal information, such as your name and contact details, from the Settings page in your dashboard.
faq_q_contact: How can I contact Yahnu support?
faq_a_contact: You can reach our support team via email at contact@yahnu.ci or by using the contact form on this page. We aim to respond within 24 business hours.
faq_q_pending: My account is 'pending'. What does that mean?
faq_a_pending: When you register as a graduate, your account must be verified and activated by an administrator from your school. This ensures that only legitimate students and alumni have access. If your account remains pending for more than a few days, please contact your school's career services or administration.
faq_q_profile: How can I make my profile stand out?
faq_a_profile: A complete profile is key! Make sure to upload a professional photo, fill out all sections (experience, education, skills), and use the AI-powered resume parser to get started. A detailed and well-written profile is much more likely to attract company interest.
faq_a_matching: Our AI algorithm analyzes your profile, including your skills, experience, education, and stated interests. It then compares this information against available job postings to recommend roles that are a strong fit for you. The more complete your profile, the better the matches will be.
faq_q_post_job: How do I post a job?
faq_a_post_job: You can post and manage your job listings from the 'Company Profile' page in your dashboard. Click on the '+' icon in the 'Job Postings' card to add a new position.
faq_a_find_candidates: Navigate to the 'Talent Pool' page. You can search and filter our database of pre-vetted graduates by skills, school, field of study, and availability to find the perfect candidates for your roles.
faq_q_partnerships: How do partnerships with schools work?
faq_a_partnerships: Go to the 'Partnerships' page to discover schools. You can send partnership requests to institutions to build closer relationships, which can give you priority access to their top talent and collaboration opportunities.
faq_q_approve_graduates: How do I approve new graduate accounts?
faq_a_approve_graduates: On the 'Graduate Management' page, you will find a 'Pending Activation' tab. This tab lists all students and alumni from your institution who have registered. You can review their details and activate their accounts from there.
faq_q_school_partnerships: How can my school partner with companies?
faq_a_school_partnerships: Companies on the platform can send you partnership requests, which you can manage on the 'Partnerships' page. You can also proactively reach out to companies by showcasing your school's programs and top graduates.
faq_q_placement_analytics: How can I track my graduates' success?
faq_a_placement_analytics: The 'Analytics' page provides detailed insights into your graduates' placement rates, the top companies hiring them, and the industries they are entering. This data helps you understand and improve your career service effectiveness.
faq_q_language_theme: How can I change the language or theme?
faq_a_language_theme: You can change the language and theme (Light/Dark/System) from the settings menu. On desktop, click the vertical dots icon in the top right of the navigation bar. On mobile, this is also in the 'More' menu.
faq_q_resume_parser: Why didn't the resume parser extract all my information correctly?
faq_a_resume_parser: Our AI resume parser is very powerful, but its accuracy can depend on the resume's format and layout. For best results, use a clean, standard resume format (e.g., a single-column PDF). After parsing, always review the pre-filled fields for accuracy and completeness.
faq_q_assessment_generator: What kind of questions does the AI Assessment Generator create?
faq_a_assessment_generator: The AI generates two types of questions: 'Basic Fit' questions, which are tailored to your company values and the soft skills required for the job, and 'Cognitive Aptitude' questions, which assess problem-solving and critical thinking skills relevant to the role's complexity.
faq_q_event_management: Who gets notified when I create an event?
faq_a_event_management: When you create an event, all registered graduates from your institution on the Yahnu platform will receive a notification, inviting them to view the event details and RSVP.
contact_form_desc: If you couldn't find your answer in the FAQ, please fill out the form below.
form_message_placeholder: Please describe your issue in detail...
form_submitted_desc: Thank you for contacting us. Our support team will get back to you shortly.
